title: Peer Assessment and Feedback Quality Improvement Strategies for Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Focuses on improving feedback quality strategies to help pre-service teachers effectively utilize peer assessment in social studies lesson design. Provides blended learning environments centered on formative assessment using personal devices

learning_goals: Application of peer feedback design principles to create specific evaluation guidelines
Diagnosis of peer feedback levels using feedback quality assessment criteria
Application of an analytical framework to distinguish characteristics of feedback types (e.g., content-related/expression-related)
Can comply with structured feedback writing procedures on online platforms at over 80% adherence
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
